params.newAddress: The address of the Uniswap V3 factory
The address of the non fungible position manager
The address of the swap router

nonfungiblePositionManagerAddress.return: address The address of the non fungible position manager

swapRouterAddress.return: address The address of the swap router

uniswapV3FactoryAddress.return: address The address of the Uniswap V3 factory

setFactoryAddress(address).notice: Set the address of the Uniswap V3 factory

setNonFungibleAddress(address).notice: Set the address of the non fungible position manager

setSwapRouterAddress(address).notice: Set the address of the swap router
